body.title: Software Developer
task:
Took the complete ownership of developing the Payment Arrangements module for a Telecom giant of Thailand from design to production. Delivered assignments before schedule time and with very high code quality. Resulting in single digit defects during UAT and smooth transition to production.

Tech Stack: React, Redux-Saga, TypeScript, Webpack, GIT, SonarCube
Developed automation pipelines using Python and Apache Airflow used for loading new offers from buisness to Oracle databases for a Telecom giant of Thailand.

body.title: Programmer Analyst
task:
Part of Product Enhancement team for a Canadian Insurance Client, involved in all stages of SDLC, developing/enhancing features related to User stories for their frontend application.
Tech stack: React, Redux, Javascript
